WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed for 2.2.20 (hopefully; if not, it'll be in 2.2.21)
WorkItem.Description:
I opened an old character; the professions listed in the new option panel says "None"/"None"
Reloaded from armory.  The professions didn't change.
Opened character from armory.  The professions didn't change.
Saved the character.  Closed Rawr.  Reopened Rawr and the Character XML file.  Still "None"/"None"
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Reload Character from Armory does not update professions
